curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.korean: 왜 그렇게 느끼는지 이해할 수 있어요.
curriculum.english: I can understand why you feel that way.

grammarTip.title: Empathy Statement
grammarTip.explanation: 상대방의 감정을 인정하고 공감하는 표현은 대화의 깊이를 더합니다. 'I understand', 'Valid' 등의 단어를 활용하세요.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: It must have been tough for you.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.korean: 필요한 게 있다면 내가 여기 있어요.
curriculum.english: I am here for you if you need anything.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Your feelings are valid.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.korean: 삼가 고인의 명복을 빕니다 (상실에 대해 유감입니다).
curriculum.english: I am sorry for your loss.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.korean: 걱정 마요, 다 잘 될 거예요.
curriculum.english: Don't worry, everything will be fine.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Take all the time you need.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: I appreciate you sharing this with me.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: You are not alone in this.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Let me know how I can help.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: I feel nostalgic when I hear this song.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: She was overwhelmed by the support.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.korean: 그는 그 결정에 대해 양가감정을 느꼈다.
curriculum.english: He felt ambivalent about the decision.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: A sense of serenity filled the room.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: I am incredibly grateful for your kindness.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Terrified, he froze in place.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.korean: 그녀는 생각에 잠긴 듯 사색적으로 보였다.
curriculum.english: She looked pensive and thoughtful.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: I am enthusiastic about the new project.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: He was furious at the mistake.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: We are delighted to hear the news.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: We need to clear the air.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Let's try to find common ground.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: I apologize if I offended you.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: It was a misunderstanding on my part.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Let's agree to disagree.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.korean: 나는 내가 옳은 것보다 우리 관계를 더 소중히 여깁니다.
curriculum.english: I value our relationship more than being right.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Can we start over?

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Please hear me out.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: I am willing to compromise.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Let's put this behind us.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: She has a charismatic personality.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: He is known for being meticulous.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: They are optimistic about the future.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: She is incredibly resilient.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: He tends to be introverted.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Reliability is his best trait.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: She is generous to a fault.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: He is ambitious and driven.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: They are open-minded and curious.

curriculum.question: Emotional Intelligence
curriculum.english: Integrity is essential for a leader.

curriculum.question: Review
curriculum.english: Your feelings are valid.
